items.title: Families shocked Swiss ski bar was not inspected for years before deadly fire
items.description: The New Year's Eve fire at a bar in Crans-Montana killed 40 people and injured 116.

items.title: Plot to kill Burkina Faso leader foiled, says junta
items.description: The security minister accuses neighbouring Ivory Coast of funding the plan to kill Capt Traor√©.

items.title: Russia sends navy to guard oil tanker being pursued by US forces
items.description: US officials say that American forces plan to seize the Russian-flagged ship, which is accused of breaking sanctions.

items.title: Trump says Venezuela will be 'turning over' up to 50 million barrels of oil to US
items.description: Earlier the president said US oil firms could be "up and running" in the country within 18 months.

items.title: Opposition leader Machado says her coalition should lead Venezuela
items.description: President Trump has publicly dismissed the Nobel winner Machado saying she doesn't have local support and respect.
